metadata.title: CVE-2020-10380 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
RMySQL through 0.10.19 allows SQL Injection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-cran-rmysql - 0.10.20-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rmysql package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.20-1').
